website_summaries.verdict: Worth the minor quirks if you are looking for heated gloves that do a good job keeping your hands warm and that you can wear while you text.
pros: Made of moisture-resistant material that is warm yet breathable
Three heat settings allow you to choose the temperature that works best for weather conditions
cons: Sizes have the tendency to run a bit small

customer_reviews.title: No cold HJ's when wearing these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the girlfriend so her hands stay warm when we ski. She loved them and now I get hand jobs on the chair lift with warm hands !
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: My hand are so toasty inside these gloves. I don't want to take them off.
customer_reviews.text: I love how these fit on my hand. Perfect size for my hands. At first I was like I have never needed a battery powered warmer in my gloves and my hands stay nice and warm. I was thinking these heating gloves were to much. Then I tried them on with the warmer on and I fell in love with how toasty my hands felt. Super great if you are a snowboard or skier. Plus you can work your phone with out taking your gloves off as you will see in the video I posted. Anyway, I am stoked on these heated gloves. Super COOL buy!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: So far they seem to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: My hands are always cold and living in Michigan I thought these would help me. They were easy to charge and both battery packs worked well. I am a petite female and the large fits, but I wish they had a medium. My husband has small hands and the large fit him perfectly. If you have big hands I'd order the biggest size. Winter isn't here yet, but it is chilly. I will update this review when I get to wear them out for awhile, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and confortable
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are made of good quality materials. The large size fits like a typical medium in the US. Unknown if they are waterproof, as I have yet to use them out in the snow. They heat up on high within 5 minutes, and stay warm. Will update as I use them more.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves came with the larger 7.4V batteries. Surprisingly enough, I could not feel the added size of the larger battery. When they first arrived, I immediately charged them and that took approximately 4 hours. When trying them out I found these gloves to be very comfortable and the temperature controls worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: P P

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Not only does these gloves keep my hands warm, but you can also use your phone or tablet while you have them on. To me, that's one of the biggest things as I hate taking off gloves when I have to use my phone. With adjustable heat settings, these are an excellent deal and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS COMPANY. First the sizes are very small for what is advertised and then the replacements where sent with a defective battery. I offered to return the gloves that were too small for the larger size and was told to keep them. If i had been told to just switch out batteries i wouldn't have agreed to this. Now, i have a very expensive pair of normal gloves! DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS COMPANY!
customer_reviews.author: rjgreen3

customer_reviews.title: one battery doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Leaving this review in hopes that seller can send me a replacement battery. One battery doesn't charge: the charger's light stays green when I plug that bad battery into the charger, as opposed to red when the good battery is plugged into the charger. Neither glove will turn on when I plug the bad battery in, both gloves turn on when the good battery is plugged into them. The glove seems a little slow to heat up, but I think it would be ok, so long as both batteries worked!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Warm hands without sacrificing dexterity.
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade! They work great. Dexterity on the fingers were impressive too.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Watch the default for XL size
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back because they were so wide. If you want size large ( the smallest offered) be careful that you choose the drop down. These are not made for slim hands or long fingers. They looked to be good quality, but I never tested the heat element that has to be charged overnight
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas, but we live in Texas so we just used them for the first time on our annual ski trip. While they are nice looking gloves, they did not hold a charge after one use. Super disappointed that now it is past the returnable date and I am at a loss for the cost of these gloves. These are now just over-glorified ski gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: They don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for northwoods ice fishing. They take forever to charge and don't hold heat well or for very long. They're thick, but not very waterproof/water resistant either.
customer_reviews.author: Alexx

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for electric gloves that recharge and warm up the base of the hand then these are for you. If, like me, your finger tips freeze easily then these aren't the greatest. I used them a lot for early morning cart pushing and trash runs at work and was glad I had them (but they need to make a pair that protect the finger tips).
customer_reviews.author: kevinwcousins

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it! Size runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about purchasing them at first, but read pretty good reviews. Tried them out the first time on a motorcycle ride at 40 degrees. Kept my hands nice and warm! Very comfortable, not too bulky. I usually take a size medium but the size large fits great! Be careful connecting/disconnecting the batteries! Wires in glove are fairly small gauge and will brake in time at connection. Had this happen to my last gloves. Hope they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Kingsthings

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: wore these gloves all winter in zero weather to feed animals and even wore them duck hunting in South Dakota in Dec. they are water proof so were great for pulling decoys out of freezing water. rechargeable. wish i had second set of batteries because they don't last all day duck hunting. 3 settings and you can easily turn them off to save batteries
customer_reviews.author: eim

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: So I know it's not winter yet so I can't get a actual feel for them. These gloves are so thick and warm alone, when you turn the battery on they get very warm! They're very comfortable, I can't wait to try them again when it gets colder. But I have no doubt that they won't do the job. These get REALLY warm!!
customer_reviews.author: Jocy Warner

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy disposable hand warmers.  They work.
customer_reviews.text: Used while plowing snow with unshielded can. The were Luke warm briefly.
customer_reviews.author: bill axline

customer_reviews.title: Good buy so far
customer_reviews.text: Living in Wisconsin and needing a pair of heavy gloves that are heated is ideal. I'll admit I've only worn them twice, once to test them in my house to make sure the battery worked and how quickly they may heat up. Today I wore them in 30 degree weather with wind and they worked great. I can hope the heating function keeps working, otherwise its just an expensive pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quality seemed to be lacking in the manufacturing process. Quite small for “men’s” gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was excellent, but I was unable to really test them out. The left glove was quite snug - couldn’t even flex my fingers once on. The right glove felt like the liner had separated from the outer shell, wadding up to where I couldn’t get my hand past the elastic of the gauntlet at the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Larson

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, set on low was perfect for me in 35 degree temps. Used 6 hours and still had more battery
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Could be warmer.
customer_reviews.text: They do produce some warmth, but I was expecting more. They are not 'giftable.' Nothing is 'giftable.' 'Giftable' is not a word. 'Gift' is a noun, not a verb.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying winter again with warm hands!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are great to keep my hands warm when no other gloves can. I did notice the size large does fit more like a medium in any other gloves but that is the only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and heat up fast
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair for my girlfriend, who has frequently cold hands. She states they are very comfortable. It does work pretty well and the fabric is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, heat up fast
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly. Doesn’t necessarily warm up fingers that are already numb before going into the gloves. But keeps hands warm when you go out in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Leonard

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases
customer_reviews.text: The gloves arrived on time, in new condition. Easy to charge, comfortable to wear, kept my hands warm for hours. I like the 3 different heat settings.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Plaskon

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband, he works outside. We live in a suburb right outside of Chicago. So it gets cold. He loves them! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: already having problems
customer_reviews.text: got these in December, and they are already not working right, with a full charge, they are not heating up properly, not a happy shopper.
customer_reviews.author: hilda

customer_reviews.title: excellent gloves
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to my husband, and he really likes them. They heat up quickly and keep his hands warm. I would just say to order a size bigger than normal. I asked the seller about exchanging them for a larger size. She responded right away and quickly sent out a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: birdie

customer_reviews.title: easy to use & battery life & gifttable
customer_reviews.text: us them for my morning walk which is a hour long , would last about 3 times on high , only heats the backs of hands . After 3 weeks one glove quit working so I wouldn't gift them to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better , but love the gloves ! They work like a dream and make all my friends jealous when it’s 4 degrees F out
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W Fondren

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Spent all this money on a pair for my father and after a month of light use they stop working?? What a sham!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love them especially when out side snowblowing and shoveling. keeps your hands warm and I live in New York upstate.
customer_reviews.author: Junnybugs

customer_reviews.title: These really work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He is wearing them and says they work well. He is hard to please. I told my two sisters about these and they plan to order some.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Fingertips cold
customer_reviews.text: Kept hands warm enough, but fingertips still cold - kinda was the point of trying these
customer_reviews.author: robyn sites

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for Minnesota winter!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hubby's hands warm for plowing. Batteries last during use. Size is true to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Long

customer_reviews.title: Get the socks too! :)
customer_reviews.text: Used them while riding the ATV hunting in November in the idaho mountains. Worked great, ran on low to preserve battery. Lasted several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, however really bulky and made driving with them difficult. Heated element is nice.
customer_reviews.author: A&J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, you get exactly what's advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm a forester, so I'm in the woods a lot especially when it's very cold. These gloves are awesome, retain heat well, produce great heat and lasted all day. I recommend turning then off when your hands reach comfort as it will save the battery. I just wish they came in a smaller size as they are to big for me...size large....and I'm a women.
customer_reviews.author: DHW Forest Consulting, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very slick and can't grip anything at all.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for christmas to use when riding my motorcycle, not happy there very slick and dangerous to use, no gripping with them. Charged them up this feb 3rd full 24 hrs to use on feb 4th on a day that could actually ride, but still little cold and the battery life only stayed charged 3 hrs. Not as advertised, would like a complete refund.
customer_reviews.author: davebradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work,  but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Stopped heating fully after about 3 weeks of minimal usage. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Henry Williams

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THESE HEATED GLOVES !
customer_reviews.text: 1st Great fit, nice & snug. Really great quality gloves. Fast battery charge. Love that one can use the different heat levels to pro-long the battery life. Great for NYC winter bike riding, can ride long distance without crying from tip finger numbness. Touch screen fantastic too ! Has ALL the features you need in a heated glove.
customer_reviews.author: ren

customer_reviews.title: Nice in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for road cycling, the dexterity is great with my fingers. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better- about two hours on high. The heat is decent and noticeable, although really only feel it on the backside of the hand. Even without the heat they are pretty good gauntlet style gloves. Overall a win at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: sgratien

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for his early morning bike rides. He loves them, especially the different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great for really cold days
customer_reviews.text: My sisters a mail carrier and I got them for her and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for winter activities.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wore these gloves to a recent football game and were the envy of all around us for our “high tech” gloves. Very warm even after battery died.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Comfrotable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and intuitive. Only downside is to that we can't get them wet. Easy to connect and reconnect the battery if you really want to use it in the snow or rain.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Wang

customer_reviews.title: They are not waterproof. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are not waterproof. Water easily leaks in and wets the fingers and the palm. In other words, they are useless in rain conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Avner

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Have them as a gift and so far they love them
customer_reviews.author: Jason Boulrice

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I wore them twice now they won't cut on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kinte

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my BF, his hands hurt and itch in the cold. The gloves have helped him tremendously. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: ann m. apostolico

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my hands warm I love it! The battery life is very short but it works
customer_reviews.author: Black Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor gloves
customer_reviews.text: Have used them for lots of outdoor activities including 4 hours at football game. Work terrific. Great for bike rides too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I like it. This helps me for delivery in winter. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great and the batteries are easy to charge. Highly recommend for show moving, and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Schnieders

customer_reviews.title: Worked for over 3 hours, kept my hands warm
customer_reviews.text: Used the gloves for fishing on the Great Lakes, temp was 27 degrees when we started. hands were always warm
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Toasty!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gifts, those that got them loved them. Said they really keep your hand super warm!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Great Gloves just bulky hard to use when picking up objects but they work very well
customer_reviews.author: Pouncy

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I use these for hunting and I love them! Hands never get cold
customer_reviews.author: carson miller

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: One battery went dead the second time I used them
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Colton

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Hands Warm in the Winter
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are the best! They fit great and keep your hands warm in the cold weather. Everyone needs a pair of heated gloves. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: ann billeter

customer_reviews.title: nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work well they keep you hands cold in not so cold situations. they have the power button in a very easy to access spot on the glove so you can turn them on and off with one hand if need be. They can also be washed so no worries about what will happen if they get dirty!
customer_reviews.author: GOHARD

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: We live in 6 months of winter and my husbands hands crack and bleed, so these are perfect for him when he's outside in the snow and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Chezzer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves!! They stay really warm!! And keep you warm for hours!! They feel like they are really good quality and get really warm for even the coldest days!!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

product_meta.title: GLOBAL VASION Electric Heated Gloves with Rechargeable Batteries Gloves Waterproof Thermal Gloves Touchscreen for Skiing Walking Hiking Climbing Driving Cold Weather Gloves
feature_bullets: VERY FUNCATIONAL: HEATED WATERPROOF WIND RESIST GLOVES design with heating function, this electric glove makes cold hand warmer gloves
3 LEVEL TEMPERATURE CONTROL BUTTON: let you choose your favorite temperature at any time
2PCS 7.4V BATTERIES INCLUDED: The combination of electronic technology and soft cotton material allows us to experience infrared temperature simultaneously environmentally friendly and comfortable
WITH CHARGER FOR BATTERIES HEATED GLOVES: Bring these heated gloves, pass the warmth, pass the love, you and your family deserve it.

FOR EXTREAM COLD WHETHER GLOVES: If you work in the cold, or if you want to take a walk in the winter, this glove will be your loyal partner.Lining is warm yet lightweight, powerful yet thin comfortable for Palm
